price: (6) And there were men from mankind who sought refuge in men from the jinn, so they [only] increased them in burden [i.e., sin].
arabic: وَأَنَّهُۥ كَانَ رِجَالٞ مِّنَ ٱلۡإِنسِ يَعُوذُونَ بِرِجَالٖ مِّنَ ٱلۡجِنِّ فَزَادُوهُمۡ رَهَقٗا

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wa-annahu kāna rijālun mina al-insi yaʿūdhūna birijālin mina al-jini fazādūhum rahaqan
